alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:33PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 615 PM MST... At 533 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to near Big Horn to 8 miles southeast of Freeman. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Maricopa, Estrella, Freeman, Big Horn, Bosque, Sonoran National Monument, Kaka and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 117 and 155. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 23, and near mile marker 44. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 23 and 24, and between mile markers 120 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
